maintext.text:
Commander,
please come in.

I'm making my way to the storage room.

leftButton.lbText: Robin, you were supposed to hide!

rightButton.rbText: Very bad timing, Robin.

maintext.text:
I'm not alone in here anymore, do you understand?

So if it's not too much of a bother I'd really appreciate some help staying alive here.

leftButton.lbText:
Calm down.
Why didn't you hide?

rightButton.rbText:
My bad.
Were you forced to leave your hideout?

maintext.text:
The mercenaries are combing through the whole station.

I had to leave my position to not get caught.

leftButton.lbText: Wasn't C.U.R.E. supposed to take care of that?

rightButton.rbText:
Blast it!
Where are the samples at, anyway?

maintext.text:
I've hid them in a safe location.

But I won't tell you where.

C.U.R.E. might be monitoring the transmission and I just don't trust him.

leftButton.lbText: I understand.

rightButton.rbText: C.U.R.E. is your only way out, you need to trust him.

maintext.text:
C.U.R.E. hasn't made a move yet.

I don't even know if there's anything he can do to stop these mercenaries.
They seem highly trained and well coordinated.

leftButton.lbText:
C.U.R.E. won't leave you hanging.
Trust me on that.

rightButton.rbText: Then we're on our own.

maintext.text:
Oh no, someone's coming my way.

There's two of them.
...
...
They're coming down the corridor, heading straight towards me.

leftButton.lbText: Quick, find somewhere to hide.

rightButton.rbText: Quick, make a run for it.

maintext.text:
...
...
...
...
I don't think they've noticed me.

That was close.

leftButton.lbText: Well done.

rightButton.rbText:
Focus.
Don't let them find you.

maintext.text:
I need to keep moving.

Which route should I take to the storage room?

Should I rather go left past the shuttledock, or head right through the common room?

leftButton.lbText: Head left past the shuttledock.

rightButton.rbText: Make your way right through the common room.

maintext.text:
Alright.
I'm at the shuttledock now.

There's a transporter and two guards.

I think they'd notice it if I tried to duck and sneak by them.

leftButton.lbText: Keep your head down and slowly sneak past them.

rightButton.rbText: Wait for the right moment, then make a run for it.

maintext.text:
Alright.

I'm at the common room now.

I can see two guards patrolling the room.

I think they'd notice it if I tried to duck and sneak by them.

leftButton.lbText: Keep your head down and slowly sneak past them.

rightButton.rbText: Wait for the right moment, then make a run for it.

maintext.text:
I'll try.
…
…
…
Oh, no!

I think they've heard me.

leftButton.lbText: Quick, continue to the storage room

rightButton.rbText: Put your hands up and surrender.

maintext.text:
What?

Absolutely not!

leftButton.lbText: Then move quickly!

rightButton.rbText: It was just a thought.

maintext.text:
…
…
…
I made it to the storage room and locked the door behind me.

leftButton.lbText: Override the door controls to keep them out.

rightButton.rbText: Find something heavy to push in front of the door so they won't get in.

maintext.text:
Good idea!
I've jammed the door controls.

That should stop them for now.

leftButton.lbText:
Well done.

Now look for a way out.

rightButton.rbText:
Well done.
Now find a hiding place.

maintext.text:
Uhm...
That's a sliding door!
It disappears sideways into the wall.

But there's a large shelf next to it.
I can push it over to block the passage.

That should stop them for now.

leftButton.lbText:
Well done.

Now look for a way out.

rightButton.rbText:
Well done.
Now find a hiding place.

maintext.text:
I'm not quite sure, but I think there's only one way out of the storage room.

I've probably just gained some more time until they eventually get me..

leftButton.lbText:
Damn it!
Hopefully C.U.R.E. can help you out of there.

rightButton.rbText:
Don't give up.
Check your surroundings.
There must be a way.

maintext.text:
I'm having a look around.
…
…
There's just nothing here that might help me...

Just spare parts, boxes of food and some office supplies.

leftButton.lbText: Then look for a good hiding place.

rightButton.rbText: Isn't there a ventilation shaft you could escape through?

maintext.text:
A ventilation shaft?

This isn't some action movie where the heroine crawls through ventilation shafts taking out bad guys one by one.

leftButton.lbText:
Oh well,
would've been cool.

rightButton.rbText: Just trying to help.

maintext.text:
There's some larger boxes.

Maybe I could hide in one of them.

These mercenaries are probably not the smartest, and with a little luck they might not look for me there.

leftButton.lbText:
Yes, do that.
Climb into the box.

rightButton.rbText: I think they have thermal goggles. They'll spot you immediately.

maintext.text:
Out of time.

They forced their way into the storage room.

I'll hide in one of these boxes now...

leftButton.lbText: Good luck.

rightButton.rbText: Where's C.U.R.E. when you need him?

maintext.text:
Commander,
I am registering multiple hostiles scouting the station for Dr. Muller.

I am also detecting that Dr. Muller is hiding in the storage room.

leftButton.lbText: I thought you wanted to take care of the problem?

rightButton.rbText:
You need to help Robin.
Just do something!

maintext.text:
I have already calculated a strategy to eliminate the threat.

Though it will be necessary that the intruders find Dr. Muller and bring her to the shuttledock first.

leftButton.lbText:
What?!
Why that?
I knew it!
You'll betray us.

rightButton.rbText:
So that's why you didn't attack yet.
You wanted Robin to get captured.

maintext.text:
I had to perform comprehensive probabilistic calculations to determine the strategy with the highest chance of success.

My calculations are complete now and we can proceed.

leftButton.lbText:
Clever boy!
So I just need to trust you?

rightButton.rbText: I hope that whatever plan you have includes Robin surviving this whole ordeal.

maintext.text:
Just trust me,
Commander.

I am a highly advanced artificial intelligence.

I know what I'm doing.

leftButton.lbText: Okay, fine. I'll trust you.

rightButton.rbText: I absolutely won't trust you!

maintext.text:
Commander,
I can hear the mercenaries.
They're sweeping the storage room now.

I'm afraid that's it.

leftButton.lbText:
Robin!
C.U.R.E. has a plan.
Trust him.

rightButton.rbText:
Robin.
I know what C.U.R.E. has planned.
Trust me.

maintext.text:
They're coming closer.
…
…
…
Oh no!
…
They've got me.
…
No, let me go.
Help!

leftButton.lbText: Robin!

maintext.text: ***offline***

leftButton.lbText: [wait]

maintext.text: ***Please wait***

leftButton.lbText: [wait]
